Delete:
always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
    sync_valid <= 1'b0;
  end else begin
    if (exec_sync_cmd == 1'b1) begin
      sync_valid <= 1'b1;
    end else if (sync_ready == 1'b1) begin
end
Add:
always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
    end else begin
      if (exec_sync_cmd == 1'b1) begin
        sync_valid <= 1'b1;
      end else if (sync_ready == 1'b1) begin
        sync_valid <= 1'b0;
      end
